forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 69F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 20C. ENE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 70F. ENE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 20C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 69F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 17C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 62F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 63F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
